title: Holiday Party: Potluck + White Elephant Gift Exchange
desc: Join us to celebrate an amazing 2015 with Diversability!? All are invited. Potluck:  Snacks or drinks welcome. If you would like to bring something, please add yourself here:? http://bit.ly/diversabilitypotluck White Elephant Gift Exchange:  If you would like to play "white elephant," please bring a gift (max $10). ? Venue is wheelchair accessible.
